EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Global_Nurture_GoDirect_ATR_mih.201905_Global_Nurture_GoDirect_ATR_Email1_m
EmailTemplate.subject: Is Your Airline Spending too much $ on Fuel?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
A recent Honeywell session at the OneWorld conference in Tokyo revealed data analytics was the No. 1 way airlines uncovered fuel savings opportunities to maximize profits. These were the four fuel-efficiency trends <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/blogs/2019/march/fuel-efficiency-what-else-is-possible]]> airlines said they plan to deploy using the power of data analytics this year.
With fuel approaching one-quarter of the typical airline’s operating costs, what are you doing to reduce your fuel spend? Are you leveraging your data? If not, it’s time to give our data analytics platform and expert a try. If you’re not, you’re leaving money on the table.
Meet Honeywell’s GoDirect™ Flight Efficiency, the solution that leverages existing flight data to help you achieve up to 5% fuel savings. The tool provides unprecedented visibility into flight operations to drive efficiency in some of the most crowded, complex airspaces in the world – all with the goal of getting your passengers to their destinations on-time.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_spog_atr&utm_content=marketo]]>
